alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Crook; Weston (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 8:53PM MDT until June 20 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Campbell County in northeastern Wyoming... Northwestern Weston County in northeastern Wyoming... Southwestern Crook County in northeastern Wyoming... * Until 1000 PM MDT. * At 852 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles south of Rozet, or 15 miles east of Gillette, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Moorcroft, Keyhole Reservoir, Pine Haven and Carlile. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 139 and 175. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
